questions.question_text: Mumukshune utkrusht gunni prāpti thāy tenu kāran shu chhe?
options: Bhagwānnī kathā-vārtā sāmbhalyāmā jene jețalī prīti tene tețalo jagatno abhāv thay tathā kām, krodh, lobhādik doshno nāsh thāy
questions.correct_answer: Bhagwānnī kathā-vārtā sāmbhalyāmā jene jețalī prīti tene tețalo jagatno abhāv thay tathā kām, krodh, lobhādik doshno nāsh thāy
questions.explanation: Mumukshune utkrusht gunni prāpti Bhagwānnī kathā-vārtā sāmbhalyāmā jene jețalī prīti tene tețalo jagatno abhāv thay tathā kām, krodh, lobhādik doshno nāsh thāy.

questions.question_text: Jene kathā-vārtāmā āļas hoy tenī kornī em ațaka! karavī je, 'Emā shu nahī āve?
questions.explanation: Jene kathā-vārtāmā jene āļas hoy tenī kornī em ațaka! karavī je, 'Emā moță gun nahī āve.

questions.question_text: Vishvās rākhīne prītie sahit je Bhagwan Purushottam Nārāyaņnī vāt sāmbhaļvī ethī bīju manne sthir thavānu ne nirvişhayī thavānu koi shu nathī?
questions.explanation: Vishvās rākhīne prītie sahit je Bhagwan Purushottam Nārāyaņnī vāt sāmbhaļvī ethī bīju manne sthir thavānu ne nirvişhayī thavānu koi moțu sādhan nathī.

questions.question_text: Shunī vātu nirantar karavī ne sāmbhaļvī?
questions.explanation: Bhagwān ne Sādhunā mahimānī vātu nirantar karavī ne sāmbhaļvī.
